Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I propose a price of $11,000 for this remarkable product. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while still allowing us to fairly compensate for our investment and expertise. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
